'''1.19.21''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released on August 23, 2022 on most platforms,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/8554565798413|title=Minecraft - 1.19.21 (Bedrock)|website=feedback.minecraft.net|date=August 23, 2022}}</ref> and August 25, 2022 for Nintendo Switch,<ref>{{cite|url=https://twitter.com/MojangStatus/status/1562813120867110912|title=Minecraft version 1.19.21 is now available on Nintendo Switch and players should once again be able to join others through cross-platform multiplayer. Thanks for your patience while we worked to resolve the issue. -MG|website=twitter.com|date=August 25, 2022}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay.
* Fixed an issue that caused villagers' professions to not reflect in their clothing. ({{bug|MCPE-160475}})
* Fixed a bug where graphical artifacts appear while playing on some devices. ({{bug|MCPE-160491}}, {{bug|MCPE-160758}}, {{bug|MCPE-160451}})
* Fixed a bug where the names hovering above mobs were slightly offset. ({{bug|MCPE-160254}})
* Fixed an issue that caused some blocks on Marketplace worlds to appear as "update blocks" on Realms.
* Paid emotes can no longer be equipped for free.
